name: Hoodwreck
description: Developed in Mt. Hood, OR, by Valhalla Pharm, Hoodwreck is a sativa-dominant hybrid cross of Trainwreck and Purple Diesel. These dense, sticky, dark green buds feature purple highlights and an earthy, slightly citrusy scent with a sweet diesel flavor when smoked. The effects of this strain creep up on you slowly, gradually elevating your mood and fully relaxing your body.Â
attributes_title: Euphoric, Happy, Creative, Energetic, Focused, Fatigue, Cramps, Depression, Eye Pressure, Headaches
